channel.title: Only donors and admin+ can wield
channel.description:
i know this has been done many of times, but all the codes i have tried are not compatible with my server.
i dont have wearID, i have something like getItems().sendWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]
how would i make it so only donors or admins+ can wield.
this is going to be a spawn server.
thanks to anyone who can help me
